channel.title: 508 server npc follow player in combat
channel.description: Does anyone have the code for npc.java or NpcPlayercombat.java that makes the npc follow the player if he attacks it and runs. Also if anyone knows the code to make aggressive mobs that attack players please let me know thanks ^^
